title: On determinants involving $(\frac{j^2-k^2}p)$ and $(\frac{jk}p)$
abstract:
Let $p$ be an odd prime and let $(\frac{\cdot}p)$ be the Legendre symbol. In
this paper, we study the determinant
$$\det\left[\left(\frac{j^2-k^2}p\right)+\left(\frac{jk}p\right)w\right]_{\delta\le
j,k\le (p-1)/2}$$ with $\delta\in\{0,1\}$. For example, we prove that the
determinant does not depend on $w$ if $p\equiv3\pmod4$ and $\delta=0$.
